title: The North Sea: where do you draw the line
creator_credit: Peter Clark, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: Looks at the question of where the line should be drawn in relation to off-shore boundaries, fishing quotas, gravel extraction, pollution limits and storm surges in the North Sea. Suitable for upper secondary level.
title_for_label: The North Sea: where do you draw the line
description: Looks at the question of where the line should be drawn in relation to off-shore boundaries, fishing quotas, gravel extraction, pollution limits and storm surges in the North Sea. Suitable for upper secondary level.
